name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spb stock market filter for macrotrends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances stocks-screener on https://www.macrotrends.net/stocks/stock-screener
Features:
- filter stocks by ticker
- show only SPB exchange stocks
- select stocks from table

How to use:
1) install this extension
2) go to https://www.macrotrends.net/stocks/stock-screener 
3) click on extension icon and select filter
